gobblin.runtime.cli

Interface EmbeddedGobblinCliFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstructorAndPublicMethodsGobblinCliFactory, EmbeddedGobblin.CliFactory, PublicMethodsGobblinCliFactory

    public interface EmbeddedGobblinCliFactory
    A factory for EmbeddedGobblin instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EmbeddedGobblin buildEmbeddedGobblin(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cli)
      Build a EmbeddedGobblin from the parsed CommandLine.
      org.apache.commons.cli.Options getOptions() 
      String getUsageString()
      Get a usage string for display on the command line.

    • Method Detail

      • getOptions

        org.apache.commons.cli.Options getOptions()
        Returns:
        an instance of Options understood by this factory.

      • buildEmbeddedGobblin

        EmbeddedGobblin buildEmbeddedGobblin(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cli)
        Build a EmbeddedGobblin from the parsed CommandLine. The input CommandLine was parsed with the output of Options, but may include additional Options added by the driver.

      • getUsageString

        String getUsageString()
        Get a usage string for display on the command line. The output of this method will be appended to the base string "gobblin run ". This should specify required options or parameters.
